review: Pretty good game to party up with friends and have a great time, the graphics are pretty smooth and nice looking and the navigation and shooting is done pretty well definately worth the money. But then again i only bought it for $10 on sale a few months ago and bought Gage weapon pack #1 and #2 and the courier mod pack on steam summer sale. $30 is a pretty average price for the game.

review: This game truly amazing it may be pre alpha but i haven't had many problems with it this is possibly one the best pre alpha games i have ever played.This game gives you a glimpse of what a apocalytic struggle would be like. You choose whether you want to fight along through the struggle with people that are friendly other survivors or you can fight with people that kidnap, steal and kill other survivors (bandits) you choose.
